text:
When using a custom font from a metric file font-weight does not seem to have
any effect.. The font is of 1px width even if the weight is set to bold bolder
etc...
creator: vmanickam@mintel.com

text:
Does your custom font actually contain the glyphs for the font-weight you want
to render?

If not then add those to your custom font and it should display correctly.

BTW, unless you are really sure its a bug it is generally preferable to ask
questions on the fop-user mailing list regarding the perceived problem first.
The issue of font-weight and custom fonts was previously discussed on that list.
creator: manuel@apache.org

text:
FWIW: the handling of relative font-weights was far from complete in 0.93, in some cases outright 
erroneous. I've recently committed some small changes to the trunk that should partly solve it.
